Lewisville.Volunteers of America LPGA North Dallas:
The Volunteers of America LPGA Texas Classic is a women's professional golf tournament on the LPGA Tour. It debuted in April 2013 at Las Colinas Country Club in Irving, Texas.
Volunteers of America, the title sponsor, is a faith-based nonprofit organization that provides affordable housing and other assistance, primarily to low-income people, throughout the United States.
